description:
reboot gets network info from the network manager in the API only to pass it to the manager.

1) There's a performance penalty there.  
2) It's a problem with cells as you want the cell to which the instance belongs doing the query to its network manager.
title: reboot does network query in API

commit 0668194c5a6993c9d8a2c912b66406bf50fe8534
Author: Chris Behrens <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Jan 11 21:43:00 2013 +0000

    Move network call from compute API to the manager
    
    reboot gets network info from the network manager in the API only to pass
    it to the manager.  This causes an un-needed delay on the API call.  It
    also causes issues with cells, as with cells you should query the network
    service close to that cell.
    
    Fixes bug 1098741
